snippet: The proposed deal would send Dwight Howard, the N.B.A.’s top center, to the Lakers from Orlando, and Los Angeles’s own All-Star center, Andrew Bynum, would head to Philadelphia.
abstract: NBA's top center Dwight Howard is on the verge of landing with the Los Angeles Lakers in a blockbuster trade that should end the festering drama that has consumed Howard and the Orlando Magic for the past year; four-team trade would send Lakers center Andrew Bynum to Philadelphia 76ers.
lead_paragraph: The proposed deal would send Dwight Howard, the N.B.A.’s top center, to the Lakers from Orlando, and Los Angeles’s own All-Star center, Andrew Bynum, would head to Philadelphia.

headline.seo: Lakers Set to Obtain Dwight Howard in Four-Team Trade
headline.main: Lakers Set to Obtain Howard in Four-Team Trade
headline.print_headline: Lakers Set to Obtain Howard in Four-Team Trade
